sources.name: Movies
sources.script: source(output(movieId as string,title as string,genres as string,dummy as string),allowSchemaDrift: true,validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

transformations.name: MoviesYear
transformations.script: SplitGenres derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear
